The Takoma Park Sanitarium. 
     We have purchased land in Takoma Park, not for the purpose of building up commercial enterprises, but for the purpose 
                                                                           11
of establishing institutions in which workers may be prepared to go out into the great harvest field. The school has made a humble beginning. A sanitarium must be established there. The ground is ready for the building. Who will now bring their hundreds and their thousands for the help of this enterprise? And let not those who can afford to give but little withhold the smaller sums.
